faq.question: How do I register for the conference?
faq.answer: Visit our registration page and follow the online registration process. You can pay by credit card, bank transfer, or other accepted payment methods.

faq.question: What is the deadline for paper submissions?
faq.answer: The deadline for abstract submission is March 31, 2026. Full paper submissions are due by May 15, 2026. Check our key dates page for the most current information.

faq.question: Are there accommodation options near the venue?
faq.answer: Yes, we have partnered with several hotels in Sekondi-Takoradi. Visit our hotels page for recommended options and special conference rates.

faq.question: What is the conference language?
faq.answer: The official language of the conference is English. All presentations, papers, and discussions will be conducted in English.

faq.question: Can I get a visa letter for conference attendance?
faq.answer: Yes, registered participants can request an official invitation letter for visa purposes. Please contact our registration department after completing your registration.
